name: rachoon
description: Rachoon is a self-hosted financial planning tool that helps manage budgets, track expenses, and visualize monthly cash flows through a user-friendly web interface.
features: Budget planning: Create monthly budgets by category to track spending limits and financial goals.
Expense tracking: Record and categorize transactions to understand where your money goes each month.
Cash flow visualization: View income and expenses over time with charts and graphs for trend analysis.
Recurring transactions: Set up automatic entries for regular bills and income to simplify monthly planning.
Category management: Organize expenses into custom categories that match your spending patterns.
Multi-currency support: Track finances in different currencies for international accounts and travel expenses.
Goal setting: Define savings targets and monitor progress toward financial milestones.
Report generation: Export financial summaries and detailed transaction lists for tax preparation or analysis.
Mobile responsive: Access your budget and record expenses from any device with a touch-friendly interface.
Data privacy: Keep all financial information on your own server without sharing with third-party services.
Import transactions: Upload bank statements in CSV format to quickly populate your expense history.
Budget alerts: Receive notifications when spending approaches or exceeds category limits.
